apanayana krushikarma departhamenthuwa magin mita wasara kipayakata pera sita badulla disthrikkaye wiwidha wyapruthi haraha kriyathmaka karanu labu gammiris wagawa me wana wita sarthaka paladawak athkara di athayi badulla disthrik apanayana krushikarma departhamenthu pradhana karyalaya penwa deyi.ema departhamenthuwa yatathe gowin ha gowi sanwidhana yatathe waga karanu labu wenath boga wana koko,kurudu,karabu, saha kopi wagawanta idiriyen boho gowin gammiris wagawata pradhana thanak di katayuthu kala athara ee hethuwen mema sarthaka bawa athi wi thibena bawa penwa dena apanayana boga wagakaruwange sanwidhana gramiya jana jiwithayanhida wishala aarthika pariwarthanayak athi wemin pawathina pawada prakasha kara siti.pasugiya kalaye wiyali gammirs kilowak ru.800 sita ru.1000 dakwa ihala milaka pawathima nisa gramiya mattame beho gowi pawul nosithu lesin mila mudal raskara gena siti bawath,atham gammiris wagakaruwan nawa wahana pawa milata ganimin thawa thawath wagakatayuthuwala nirathawimata patan gena athi bawath wadiduratath adahas dakwamin ema sanwidhana kiya siti.eheth owunge ema nishpadana adala nagara kara gena eemata tharam pramanawath marga pahasukam nomathiwima wishala adu paduwak bawa me athara sadahan karana gramiya gowi sanwidhana swauthsahayen nagi sitimata wera darana mewani gramiya pradeshayanhi chanathawa sambandhayen wadi awadhanaya thawath yomu kota awashya marga pahasukam labadimata wagakiwa yuththange wishesha awadhanaya yomu karana lesada illa siti..
